import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'app-frontend'; response=''; entries:Entry[] =[]; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.getAll(); } ping(){ this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/ping') .subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.response=data.value; }, error=>{ console.log(error); }); } getAll(){ this.response=''; this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/getAll') .subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.entries=data; }, error=>{ console.log(error); }); } } interface Response { value: string } interface Entry { id: string, entry: string, priority: string, dueDate: Date }
